item.title: My First gganimate Plot
item.description: Today I finally read a tutorial on gganimate, and here I will build my first example. My hope is to eventually simulate traversal on a directed graph. library(tidyverse) library(gganimate) Create Node Data For this example, I will have 3 nodes (located at 3 vertices of a triangle), 100 dots distributed among the nodes, and a new placement over 21 states in time. N <- 100 # number of dots T <- 20 # number of iterations node_names <- c("Node 1", "Node 2", "Node 3") iter <- rep(0, N) node <- rep("Node 1", N) x <- 10 + rnorm(N, 0, 2) y <- 20 + rnorm(N, 0, 2) states <- data.
